channel.title: Videos in After Effects 7
channel.description:
-6-25-07 The title sequence for a movie my friends and I have been putting together. All that I have left is putting in our 3D title logo my friend made in C4D, and putting it in front of the fire. The quality got shot when uploading to YouTube, but it used to be 1024x768.
Hallway Explosion. http://youtube.com/watch?v=Tqts-4fR7Ls
-6-19-07 I had a project due today, and last night I used Premiere to set it all up, then I exported this clip into After Effects. This was the first time I had ever opened this program, and I had only 45 minutes to do this, so it is slightly rushed. However, this stuff takes FOREVER even when rushing it, so I really don't like the outcome too much.
My Julius Caesar, Act 3 scene 1 :
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VrVniGyPtas
I get out of school Thursday, so hopefully now I can make a movie over the summer that I'll be a little more proud of.

item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

Well that project is over. I turned it in today.

Hopefully over the summer I’ll spend maybe a few days on a fight scene.
Also, I had no reference for the length and size. He was holding a 3 inch twig.

The title sequence for a movie my friends and I have been putting together. All that I have left is putting in our 3D title logo my friend made in C4D, and putting it in front of the fire.
The quality got shot when uploading to YouTube, but it used to be 1024x768.

-6-19-07
I had a project due today, and last night I used Premiere to set it all up, then I exported this clip into After Effects. This was the first time I had ever opened this program, and I had only 45 minutes to do this, so it is slightly rushed. However, this stuff takes FOREVER even when rushing it, so I really don’t like the outcome too much.

I get out of school Thursday, so hopefully now I can make a movie over the summer that I’ll be a little more proud of.
